title: 跑了5W格，找不到热带雨林
author: ABYSSw
txt_content: 救救孩子吧，真的要死了。有没有什么技巧

replies.author: MC深坑不回头
replies.txt_content: 1.13以上可用/locate Jungle_Pyramid命令定位丛林堡垒，直接就能传送到该丛林，1.12以下就...

replies.author: hj2629638
replies.txt_content: 是不是生成的少啊
这莫得办法啊

replies.author: 白焰BaiYan
replies.txt_content: 开启作弊/seed，去百度chunk

replies.author: 飞小RAN
replies.txt_content:
重开存档呗
下个生物群系指南针mod就行啊

replies.author: 夏了个沫
replies.txt_content: 那这个可能真的是运气不好了

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content: 开个新的也许就有了呢

replies.author: pexpect
replies.txt_content: 按照我的理解方向反了

replies.author: qq1641096147
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 幽儿~
replies.txt_content: 使用作弊模式点随机一个数字传送

replies.author: kuangshijs
replies.txt_content: 1. 13的话可以用指令，1. 12以下用小地图

replies.author: 轻击●卖萌
replies.txt_content:
https://chunkbase.com/apps/biome-finder
蘑菇岛，地牢，末地城堡，什么都能查

replies.author: a6513375
replies.txt_content: 用amidst-v4-3查找

replies.author: jakey001
replies.txt_content:
a6513375 发表于 2019-10-14 22:50
用amidst-v4-3查找
是查找命令么？

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
不妨试试自然指针mod呢，可以找到任意生物群系，然后根据指针方向走就可以了

https://www.mcmod.cn/class/754.html

https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/natures-compass

replies.author: 化名混蛋
replies.txt_content: 继续跑~  这就是游戏的乐趣

replies.author: a6513375
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 a6513375 于 2019-10-16 19:13 编辑 jakey001 发表于 2019-10-14 23:21
是查找命令么？
一个软件 amidst

replies.author: z327121579
replies.txt_content: 这只能说明你运气不好，低版本只能多找找了。或者你搜一下你的地图种子，说不定会有坐标

replies.author: Hz_bingc
replies.txt_content: 我有个地图出生超大热带雨林，转不出去了

replies.author: apzt
replies.txt_content: 你这个算是厉害，5w格都还没遇到热带雨林

replies.author: al6ian
replies.txt_content: 玩单人就要有个单人的亚子，一切靠运气呢

replies.author: a731385540
replies.txt_content: 用chunkbase看看

replies.author: cuizi
replies.txt_content: 多跑几步可能太非了
